column3: Latest;Banteay Meanchey: Volunteer doctors from Yunnan province in China are treating people with cataracts in Banteay Meanchey  and Siem Reap provinces under the name of “Brightness Action” from September 10 to 13
column4: 2019.------Treatment has been carried out free of charge in 3 districts
column5: and transport has also been provided for those who have difficulty reaching the hospital. ------RASMEI KAMPUCHEA
